name: Papo & Yo
notes: The installer won't work if the install path contain spaces.

files.humbleinstaller: N/A: Select the ".sh" install file downloaded from humblebundle.com

content:
files:
- humbleinstaller: 'N/A: Select the ".sh" install file downloaded from humblebundle.com'
game:
  exe: PapoYo.sh
  humbleid: papoandyo
installer:
- execute:
    args: -- --destination=$GAMEDIR
    file: humbleinstaller
